Article.ArticleTitle: Comment on Hietanen et al. Cytolytic Properties and Genome Analysis of Rigvir® Oncolytic Virotherapy Virus and Other Echovirus 7 Isolates. Viruses 2022, 14, 525.

Abstract.AbstractText: In a recent article published in Viruses by Hietanen et al. [...].
